name: Can Do It For
overview:
Our mission statement

“…to build a top shelf, easy to use, zero cost estimate management software suite for small contractors/service companies. It’s a way to give back and help an industry vertical that already has enough challenges without having to spend a small fortune managing paperwork.”

Our value proposition

Can Do It For offers a web-based, standards compliant, powerful, easy to use estimating management software suite for contractors, builders, remodelers, and any other service company. In less than five minutes, you can be producing professional, printable estimates for all types of construction, home improvement, and other service projects. Can Do It For has an easy flowing user interface backed by the power of the leading enterprise database system. Can Do It For was designed with contractors serving as usability consultants, so all efforts were made to ensure a pleasurable estimate experience.
